      • crash

        public void crash()
        The easiest way to cause a crash - great for testing!

      • verifyPinning

        public boolean verifyPinning(java.net.URL url)
        Helper method to verify SSL pinning is properly configured. This method is most appropriately used during testing and not production, as Fabric.with must be invoked prior to executing.
        Returns:
        true if PinningInfoProvider is assigned and a GET to the given URL returns a 200-range response, false otherwise. It will not throw an exception although the exception will be logged as an error.

      • setListener

        @Deprecated
public void setListener(com.crashlytics.android.core.CrashlyticsListener listener)
        Deprecated. use CrashlyticsCore.Builder.listener(com.crashlytics.android.core.CrashlyticsListener) and Crashlytics.Builder.core(com.crashlytics.android.core.CrashlyticsCore) instead.

      • setDebugMode

        @Deprecated
public void setDebugMode(boolean debug)
        Deprecated. use Fabric.Builder.debuggable(boolean) instead.
